title: Best Nothing Phone 2a Plus fast chargers
description: Charge your Nothing Phone 2a Plus quickly with these fast chargers. The post Best Nothing Phone 2a Plus fast chargers appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Charge your Nothing Phone 2a Plus quickly with these fast chargers.
text: The Nothing Phone 2a Plus is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7350 Pro processor. There are 8GB/12GB RAM and 256GB onboard storage configuration options. The smartphone has a 5,000mAh battery with support for 50W wired fast charging. The smartphone is claimed to offer a 50% charge in 21 minutes and a full 100% charge in 56 minutes. It means with the right fast charger, you can charge the new Nothing phone within an hour. These are the best Nothing Phone 2a Plus fast chargers to buy in 2024. Sale Anker Ace 313 45W USB-C Charger This is a single USB-C port charger with peak 45W charging speed. It has safety features like over-voltage protection, current regulation, and over-temperature protection. The charger is 30% smaller and has foldable prongs for convenient carrying around. Sale UGREEN Nexode 45W 2-port Charger This is another 45W charging speed adapter but it comes with dual USB-C ports. It can charge two devices simultaneously where you will get 20W and 25W charging speed from the two ports respectively. Sale INIU 45W 2-port Charger This INIUI fast charger has two USB-C ports and a peak charging speed of 45W. It can deliver 20W charging speed each when both ports are used simultaneously. You get foldable prongs with the charger which make it easy for traveling purposes. Sale Anker Nano II 735 65W 3-port Charger If you want a charger with more speed and ports, have a look at this one. It features two USB-C ports and a USB-A port with a peak charging speed of 65W. The USB-A port can deliver up to 22.5W charging speed. It is 53% smaller in size and can charge up to three devices at the same time. Baseus 65W 2-port Charger It is one of the slimmest chargers with a USB-C port, a USB-A port, and 65W charging speed. When both ports are used together, it delivers 45W and 20W speeds respectively. It has only 0.66-inch thickness and foldable prongs make it even more portable. Sale Belkin 40W 2-port Charger Belkin's fast charger features dual USB-C charger and it has a peak charging speed of 40W. It has Programmable Power Supply (PPS) support where output voltage adjusts as per the device. It is available in a single White color. html:
The Nothing Phone 2a Plus is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7350 Pro processor. There are 8GB/12GB RAM and 256GB onboard storage configuration options. The smartphone has a 5,000mAh battery with support for 50W wired fast charging.

The smartphone is claimed to offer a 50% charge in 21 minutes and a full 100% charge in 56 minutes. It means with the right fast charger, you can charge the new Nothing phone within an hour. These are the best Nothing Phone 2a Plus fast chargers to buy in 2024.

Sale

Anker Ace 313 45W USB-C Charger

This is a single USB-C port charger with peak 45W charging speed. It has safety features like over-voltage protection, current regulation, and over-temperature protection. The charger is 30% smaller and has foldable prongs for convenient carrying around.

Sale

UGREEN Nexode 45W 2-port Charger

This is another 45W charging speed adapter but it comes with dual USB-C ports. It can charge two devices simultaneously where you will get 20W and 25W charging speed from the two ports respectively.

Sale

INIU 45W 2-port Charger

This INIUI fast charger has two USB-C ports and a peak charging speed of 45W. It can deliver 20W charging speed each when both ports are used simultaneously. You get foldable prongs with the charger which make it easy for traveling purposes.

Sale

Anker Nano II 735 65W 3-port Charger

If you want a charger with more speed and ports, have a look at this one. It features two USB-C ports and a USB-A port with a peak charging speed of 65W. The USB-A port can deliver up to 22.5W charging speed. It is 53% smaller in size and can charge up to three devices at the same time.

Baseus 65W 2-port Charger

It is one of the slimmest chargers with a USB-C port, a USB-A port, and 65W charging speed. When both ports are used together, it delivers 45W and 20W speeds respectively. It has only 0.66-inch thickness and foldable prongs make it even more portable.

Sale

Belkin 40W 2-port Charger

Belkin's fast charger features dual USB-C charger and it has a peak charging speed of 40W. It has Programmable Power Supply (PPS) support where output voltage adjusts as per the device. It is available in a single White color.
